original: Je me suis donc rendu chez lui afin de lui parler de mes sentiments à son égard.

answers.text: I therefore went at his house to talk him about my feelings towards him.
I went to his place to talk to him about my feelings for him.
I was gone at his home in order to discuss my sensations about him.

original: Il a rejeté ma proposition pour fusionner 7Speaking et le Projet Voltaire.

answers.text: He rejected my proposal to merge 7Speaking and the Projet Voltaire.
He has refused my suggestion for combining the 7Speaking with the Voltaire Project.
He turned down my proposition about merging 7Speaking and Voltair Project.

original: Il a proposé de faire une collaboration avec Duolingo.

answers.text: He had proposed to do a collaboration with Dulingo.
He offered to partnership with Dualingo.

original: Je l'ai donc assassiné de sang froid avec un dictionnaire anglais/français.

answers.text: I killed him coldly with a anglish/french book for dictionary.
I therefore murdered him with cold blood using an English-French dictionnary.
I cold-bloodedly killed him with an English/French dictionary.
